column1: '''Ian Willis''' is a games designer. He created [[wikipedia:BBC Micro|BBC Micro B]]-versions of most of [[Delta 4]]'s games
column2: including ''[[Bored of the Rings (video game)|Bored of the Rings]]''.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/bored.html Bored of the Rings] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 22 September 2010)</ref>
